title:
We recommend printing the reporting instructions page for
                                                your records.
body:
Welcome to the Superior Court of California.
The Superior Court of California, County of Imperial is a unified Superior Court, served by Judges, one Commissioner, and one Referee.

El Centro Courthouse
Ph. (760) 482-2200
Valley Plaza Infractions
Ph. (760) 336-3500
Brawley Courthouse
Ph. (760) 336-3550
Winterhaven Court
Ph. (760) 336-3500
Lower Level West Wing
939 Main Street El Centro Ca.
Jury Commissioners
Ph. (760) 482-2259
Jury Duty Instructions
Ph. (760) 482-2260

Jury Information »
Jury Assembly Room
The Jury Commissioners office is located in the lower level west wing of the El Centro Courthouse. Access ramp & Parking are available at the southwest corner of the courthouse. Hours 8:00 am to 5:00 pm Monday-Friday.
Traffic Infractions
939 West Main Street
Lower Level
El Centro, CA 92243
Ph. (760) 336-3500

Infractions »
939 West Main Street, Lower Level El Centro, CA 92243
Legal information is given, but not legal advice. Please have your case number with you if you already have a case.
More Information »

Attention
The following are the legal holidays that will be observed by the Court during calendar year 2021.

Holidays »
